page.title: 13A Day in the life, Montrose.
page.content: Thursday...I get up at 7.30, get washed and dressed in{school uniform. I have Frosties and toast for my breakfast and leave for school about 8.35 a.m. I used to watch{Breakfast {television}but I've stopped since I got my snooker table! School starts at nine with Miss McHardy taking dinner and juice money. School's o.k. For dinner I have jam sandwiches and a glass of milk. In the afternoon I go to{school orchestra}where I play recorder and glockenspeil. When I get home from school, I change into my play clothes and go out to play on my bike, a Raleigh Burner{BMX.}For tea I have hamburgers, sausage and chips then I watch T.V. At 7.00p.m. I go to the{youth club}and play football, snooker and{video games until 9.00 then I come home to watch the news before bed at 9.30. David.
